languages.text: "Неведомо. Бунт... затруднил расследование. Может, это и впрямь было дело рук коменданта, а может, среди заключенных действует, скажем, ячейка Последнего восхода. Но на тех немногих пиктах, что успели сделать надзиратели, есть странность — в разбросанных телах при доле фантазии можно увидеть определенный... узор. Отдаленно похожий на тот, что чертили проблемные узники".

"That remains to be established. The riot has... complicated the investigation. Perhaps it was the work of the warden after all, or perhaps there is a cell of the Cult of the Final Dawn operating among the prisoners. But the few picts of the corpses that the overseers managed to take contain an oddity: if one were to use their imagination, they could see a certain... pattern in the scattered bodies. One that is vaguely similar to the one these 'inconvenient' prisoners had been drawing."
languages.original_text: "Неведомо. Бунт... затруднил расследование. Может, это и впрямь было дело рук коменданта, а может, среди заключенных действует, скажем, ячейка Последнего восхода. Но на тех немногих пиктах, что успели сделать надзиратели, есть странность — в разбросанных телах при доле фантазии можно увидеть определенный... узор. Отдаленно похожий на тот, что чертили проблемные узники".

traits.locale_text: "Unknown. The riot... made the investigation more difficult. Maybe it was the work of the superintendent, or maybe there is, say, a cell of the Cult of the Final Dawn operating among the prisoners. But there is an oddity on the few picts that the wardens have managed to scratch — using your imagination a little, you can see a certain... pattern in the scattered bodies. One that is remotely similar to the one the inconvenient prisoners had been drawing."

languages.text: “答案无从知晓。由于发生了骚乱……调查工作变得更加困难重重。或许是典狱长干的，也或许是终末黎明的邪教徒渗透到了犯人之中。不过，根据监察员们设法拼凑起来的几份视讯信息，只要稍微发挥一下想象力，就能看出这些这些尸体是以某种……规律摆放在哪里的。摆出的图案和之前那些古怪囚犯的涂鸦有些相似。”
languages.original_text: "Unknown. The riot... made the investigation more difficult. Maybe it was the work of the superintendent, or maybe there is, say, a cell of the Cult of the Final Dawn operating among the prisoners. But there is an oddity on the few picts that the overseers have managed to scrounge together — if one were to use their imagination, they could see a certain... pattern in the scattered bodies. One that is remotely similar to the one these difficult prisoners had been drawing."

traits.locale_text: “答案无从知晓。由于发生了骚乱……调查工作变得更加困难重重。或许是典狱长干的，也或许是终末黎明的邪教徒渗透到了犯人之中。不过，根据监察员们设法拼凑起来的几份视讯信息，只要稍微发挥一下想象力，就能看出这些这些尸体是以某种……规律摆放在哪里的。摆出的图案和之前那些古怪囚犯的涂鸦有些相似。”

languages.text: «Eso está por ver. La revuelta ha... complicado la investigación. Es posible que fuera obra del alcaide, o que haya una célula del Culto del Amanecer Final entre los prisioneros. Sin embargo, las pocas imágenes de los cadáveres que han obtenido los supervisores contienen una anomalía. Si se usa la imaginación, se puede ver un cierto... diseño en los cuerpos dispersos. Y guarda un parecido con lo que dibujaban los prisioneros "incómodos"».
languages.original_text: "That remains to be established. The riot has... complicated the investigation. Perhaps it was the work of the warden after all, or perhaps there is a cell of the Cult of the Final Dawn operating among the prisoners. But the few picts of the corpses that the overseers managed to take contain an oddity: if one were to use their imagination, they could see a certain... pattern in the scattered bodies. One that is vaguely similar to the one these 'inconvenient' prisoners had been drawing."

traits.locale_text: «Eso está por ver. La revuelta ha... complicado la investigación. Es posible que fuera obra del alcaide, o que haya una célula del Culto del Amanecer Final entre los prisioneros. Sin embargo, las pocas imágenes de los cadáveres que han obtenido los supervisores contienen una anomalía. Si se usa la imaginación, se puede ver un cierto... diseño en los cuerpos dispersos. Y guarda un parecido con lo que dibujaban los prisioneros "incómodos"».

languages.text: 「分かりません。暴動で...捜査は難航しました。もしかしたら管理者がやったのかもしれないし、囚人の中に最後の夜明け魔女団が混じっていたのかもしれません。でも、看守たちが何とか拾い集めた数枚の絵には奇妙な点があります...少し想像力を働かせれば、散乱した死体には...ある模様が浮かび上がってくるはずです。この難解な囚人たちが描いていたものと、わずかな類似点があります」
languages.original_text: "Unknown. The riot... made the investigation more difficult. Maybe it was the work of the superintendent, or maybe there is, say, a cell of the Cult of the Final Dawn operating among the prisoners. But there is an oddity on the few picts that the wardens have managed to scrounge together — using your imagination a little, you can see a certain... pattern in the scattered bodies. One that is remotely similar to the one these difficult prisoners had been drawing."

traits.locale_text: 「分かりません。暴動で...捜査は難航しました。もしかしたら管理者がやったのかもしれないし、囚人の中に最後の夜明け魔女団が混じっていたのかもしれません。でも、看守たちが何とか拾い集めた数枚の絵には奇妙な点があります...少し想像力を働かせれば、散乱した死体には...ある模様が浮かび上がってくるはずです。この難解な囚人たちが描いていたものと、わずかな類似点があります」

languages.text: « On l'ignore toujours. L'émeute a rendu toute enquête compliquée. Peut-être était-ce l'œuvre du directeur ou d'une cellule du Culte de l'Aube finale, infiltrée parmi les détenus... Il y a toutefois quelque chose d'étrange sur les pictocaptures des cadavres que les contremaîtres ont réussi à glaner. En utilisant un peu son imagination, on peut discerner un certain... schéma dans les corps disséminés, un schéma qui ressemble à celui que dessinaient les détenus "étranges". »
languages.original_text: "That remains to be established. The riot has... complicated the investigation. Perhaps it was the work of the warden after all, or perhaps there is a cell of the Cult of the Final Dawn operating among the prisoners. But the few picts of the corpses that the overseers managed to take contain an oddity: if one were to use their imagination, they could see a certain... pattern in the scattered bodies. One that is vaguely similar to the one these 'inconvenient' prisoners had been drawing."

traits.locale_text: « On l'ignore toujours. L'émeute a rendu toute enquête compliquée. Peut-être était-ce l'œuvre du directeur ou d'une cellule du Culte de l'Aube finale, infiltrée parmi les détenus... Il y a toutefois quelque chose d'étrange sur les pictocaptures des cadavres que les contremaîtres ont réussi à glaner. En utilisant un peu son imagination, on peut discerner un certain... schéma dans les corps disséminés, un schéma qui ressemble à celui que dessinaient les détenus "étranges". »

languages.text: "Unbekannt. Der Aufstand ... hat die Untersuchungen erschwert. Vielleicht war es das Werk des Direktors, oder vielleicht gibt es unter den Gefangenen ... sagen wir ... eine Zelle des Kults der letzten Dämmerung. Eines ist aber merkwürdig an den wenigen Vids, die die Wärter finden konnten. Wenn man ein wenig seine Vorstellungskraft einsetzt, dann sieht man in den verstreuten Leichen ein gewisses ... Monster. Es ähnelt dem Muster, das die schwierigen Gefangenen gezeichnet haben."
languages.original_text: "Unknown. The riot... made the investigation more difficult. Maybe it was the work of the superintendent, or maybe there is, say, a cell of the Cult of the Final Dawn operating among the prisoners. But there is an oddity on the few picts that the wardens have managed to scrounge together — using your imagination a little, you can see a certain... pattern in the scattered bodies. One that is remotely similar to the one these difficult prisoners had been drawing."

Es ähnelt dem Muster, das die schwierigen Gefangenen gezeichnet haben."

languages.text: "Henüz belli değil. İsyan... Soruşturmayı zora soktu. Belki içeriden tezgâhlanmıştır, mahkûmların içinde Nihai Şafak Tarikatı'nın bir kolu da yer alıyor olabilir. Fakat gözetmenlerin zor bela çektiği fotolardan birkaçında gariplikler bulunuyor. Kişi hayal gücünü kullanınca etrafa saçılmış cesetlerin arasında bir çeşit... Desen görebiliyor. Şu can sıkıcı mahkûmların çizmiş olduklarına bir nebze benziyor bu desen."
languages.original_text: "That remains to be established. The riot has... complicated the investigation. Perhaps it was the work of the warden after all, or perhaps there is a cell of the Cult of the Final Dawn operating among the prisoners. But the few picts of the corpses that the overseers managed to take contain an oddity: if one were to use their imagination, they could see a certain... pattern in the scattered bodies. One that is vaguely similar to the one these 'inconvenient' prisoners had been drawing."
